flawed_nl_solution:
He made $600 mowing yards, $250 for his birthday, $150 selling items and $150 doing odd jobs so he made 600+250+150+150 = $<<600+250+150+150=1105>>1105
He made $1105 and will save 40% so he saves 1105*0.4 = $<<1105*0.4=442>>442
#### 442

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1150, not 1105. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
